summary: This is a brief email forwarding a letter regarding the Epstein matter from the Office of the Deputy Attorney General (ODAG) to U.S. Attorney Alex Acosta and others, including Ken Starr and Jay Lefkowitz. It indicates high-level DOJ communication about the case.

events.title: DOJ Email Forwarding Epstein Letter
events.description: An email is sent from the Office of the Deputy Attorney General (ODAG) to Ken Starr, Jay Lefkowitz, and others, with Alex Acosta copied, forwarding a letter regarding the Epstein matter.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated June 23, 2008, from the Office of the Deputy Attorney General (ODAG) regarding the Epstein matter.
The email is addressed to Ken Starr and Jay Lefkowitz, with Alex Acosta (then U.S. Attorney for the Southern District of Florida) copied.
The email forwards an attached letter about the Epstein case, indicating high-level Department of Justice communication and coordination.
